display_name: Arousal Index non-rapid eye movement sleep (NREM)
description: Non-rapid eye movement sleep (NREM) Arousal Index - total arousals in non-rapid eye movement sleep (NREM) per hours of non-rapid eye movement sleep (NREM)  [(Total number of arousals in non-rapid eye movement sleep (NREM)) / (hours of non-rapid eye movement sleep (NREM))]
